front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)--Multi-channel Operation

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document corrects errors in IEEE Std 1609.4-2010 in the following areas. References to current documents including IEEE Stds 1609.0, 1609.2, 1609.12, and P1609.6. Also IEEE Std 802.11p, now part of IEEE Std 802.11-2012. Clarification of channel access features in the document body and PICS. Clarification of the common time reference. Clarification of the requirement for setting channel busy during the guard interval.
